Posts.Content: Tnadav wrote: I'm having a mastectomy with Dr Blair in a couple weeks. My wedding is in July and I'm panicking that I won't be recovered if I do direct to implant. Has anyone gotten a mastectomy with her? Were you happy with your results? I'm spiraling a little bit with all of the different options and decisions that have to be made. Let me know if you've gone to Moore's and have an advice! Thank you so much : Log in to post a reply
